text: Shadow Dancing may refer to: * Shadow Dancing (album), a 1978 album by Andy Gibb ** "Shadow Dancing" (song), a 1978 song on the album of the same name * "Shadow Dancing" (Babylon 5), a 1996 Babylon 5 episode * Shadow dancing, a variation of the country/western two-step * Shadow Dancing (film), a 1988 film starring Christopher Plummer ==See also== * Shadow play, a form of ancient Chinese puppetry
title: Shadow Dancing
